id: # id is a unique identifier for each demand
# enable_settings is the settings that have to be enabled for this demand to be active
# commodity_demand_type is the type of this commodity demand
# commodity is the commodity that will be demanded
# data is demand type specific data

commodity_demand_type: supply} the same amount of the commodity
commodity: data specifies how much as a single integer

commodity_demand_type: supply} more of the commodity as the market grows
commodity: data specifies modifier to the market size as a signed integer

commodity_demand_type: supply} depending on if the market has the conditions specified. If the market doesn't have any of the conditions
